body: Doesn't look like we're seeing this anymore. Closing as part of buildpony bankruptcy.

Reopening as failure seen on a recent run (though not a heap-use-after-free report as above).

log in https://grpc-testing.appspot.com/job/gRPC_master_tsan_cpp/1348/testReport/junit/(root)/c++_linux_tsan_native/bins_tsan_end2end_test___gtest_filter_End2end_End2endTest_ClientCancelsRequestStream_1__GRPC_POLL_STRATEGY_poll_cv/

test run on 4/23 at 1am failed, though runs since then have passed

```

Failing for the past 1 build (Since Failed#1348 )
```
